Description.string(): Gives a 15% chance that an attack will do 25 bonus damage and stun an opponent for 2 seconds.
Gives 15% extra damage to the attacks of nearby friendly units.
Reduces movement speed by 30% attack rate by 65% and damage by 50% of a target enemy unit. Lasts 20 seconds.
Gives a 15% chance to do 175% damage on an attack.
Gives 5 additional armor to nearby friendly units.
Increases nearby friendly units' movement speed by 15% and attack rate by 10%.
Causes roots to burst from the ground immobilizing a target enemy unit for 10 seconds and dealing 33 damage per second.
Gives a 15% percent chance to avoid an attack.
Burns nearby enemy land units for 12 points of damage per second.
Gives a 25% chance that an attack will deal 80 damage to nearby units.
Increases life regeneration by 20HP per second.
A wave of force that ripples outward causing 90 damage to enemy units in a line.
Slows enemy unit's attack rate by 25% and movement speed by 60%. Lasts 12 seconds.
An aura that gives nearby friendly units a damage shield which deals 10% of an enemy unit's attack damage back to it.
An aura that gives nearby friendly units a 15% bonus damage to their ranged attacks.
Slams the ground dealing 45 damage to nearby enemy units and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
